name: House Teague
summary: House Teague was a noble house from the Riverlands. According to semi-canon sources they were once the rulers of the Riverlands, before the conquest by the ironmen and Aegon I. They ruled the Riverlands after the fall of House Mudd, but it is unknown how soon afterward they rose to become the rulers. They blazoned their arms with a golden trident upright on black between two golden flanches.[1]
